Description:
CHARACTER CHARM
There is a uniqueness and charm that characterizes 4 Thamballina Road Clifton Springs. The features of this beautiful home include a Dutch hip roof line, solid timber features and cathedral ceilings. Built in the mid 90s by the current vendors. The home was extended in 2008 expanding on the living, kitchen and bedroom space. All included there are five bedrooms, four living areas and two bathrooms.
Parents can enjoy their own space with the main bedroom, ensuite, WIR and private retreat all located upstairs. The minor downstairs bedrooms are serviced by a quality renovated bathroom.
As you enter the living area stunning timber beams compliment the cathedral ceilings, stained glass window and feature solid fuel heater. The open plan living, dining, kitchen areas incorporate access to the serene, outdoor deck with established shrubbery. A renovated kitchen has granite bench tops, quality appliances & cabinetry.
The extension incorporates a two further bedrooms with WIRs, second living area with gas log fire for those cool nights and kitchen facilitites. Up the spiral staircase there is a quiet space with its own balcony which has a water views of Corio Bay. Complete with attic storage.
Manicured gardens make outdoor time a pleasure. Addition of two water tanks provides for the vegetable garden beds.
The double garage with remote provides plenty of room for parking.

Description:
ONE OWNER, CUSTOM DESIGN /BUILD, BAY VIEWS, SOLAR PANELS.
No. 35 has been designed to suit the block and take advantage of the bay views and magnificent sunsets from inside or relaxing on the wrap round verandah. A large living and dining room combine with the adjacent kitchen, three bedrooms, master with ensuite, with all bedrooms having BIR'S, attic study with views, central bathroom and laundry . Features include split system, gas log fire, fans, Belling oven, some dble. glazed windows and more to inspect. Matured fruit trees, fernery, water tanks, workshop and plenty of access for extra cars, caravan and more storage. Built with a conscious effort to create harmony with the environment where you can just walk to the end of the street to the bay, convenience shops and golf club. This home is affordable, needs some easy maintenance , mainly paintwork and roll up your sleeves in the garden. Wow! 662 SQM approx., on the Bellarine Peninsula, just call me for an appointment now.

Description:
Rare 1000m2+ Block with Water Views
This unique property in Portarlington is on the market for the first time in over 50 years. Built in the 1960's, this three-bedroom home is located on a approx. 1013m2 corner block with the bonus of an additional two-bedroom granny flat. Stunning bay views across to Geelong and the You Yangs from the front of the house will get any buyer excited, imagine the potential views from a second storey.
From the timber flooring to the big yard, the foundations are all there. All it needs is some TLC and a creative mind. The main dwelling consisting of three bedrooms all with built in robes, bathroom, large kitchen, and dining room. The lounge and main bedroom at the front of the property enjoy views of the bay.
Joined to the main dwelling via decking, the granny flat consists of two bedrooms both with BIR's. Open plan kitchen/dining open to the decking area. The main bathroom includes shower, toilet, and vanity, while the main bedroom features a large en-suite with views.
Melbournians are making the move to regional areas and the Bellarine Peninsula is high on the list, with the Bellarine 'Taste Trail' with farm-gate producers, wineries, award-winning cafes and restaurants and stunning foreshores.
Rarely do properties of this size and location come available, with water views this location offers great possibilities. Explore the scope to extend, connect the two properties, build your dream home, or demolish and develop (STCA).
Within 1km or the foreshore and 1.5km of the town centre, this property is sure to bring interest from all buyers
Book a private inspect today, contact Trevor McManus on 0448 810 074.
Insights: First listed on 22 September, this house has been on Domain for 28 days (last updated on 22 September). It was last sold in 2007 and 6 other 5 bedroom house in Portarlington have recently been sold.

Description:
Peace, Privacy and Position
Just a stone's throw from stunning Swan Bay, Queenscliff's famous Santa Casa Beach and a short stroll to the main street this neat weatherboard home exudes cottage vibes, yet comes with every modern comfort and plenty of space. Peace and privacy are guaranteed: on a quiet, no-through road, the north-facing, single-level abode comes tucked away at the rear of the block. With a flexible floor plan, and set amongst low-maintenance surrounds, this attractive accommodation suits both permanent and holiday living.
The spacious, well-equipped kitchen comes with stainless steel appliances including a 900mm oven/gas cooktop and Westinghouse dishwasher, a handy corner pantry and ample storage space, and overlooks the comfortable dining and living zone. The master bedroom offers an ensuite with shower, vanity and WC in neutral tones, and a WIR with plenty of hanging space and shelving. Enjoying sunny front yard aspects, the two minor bedrooms have triple BIRs, and a versatile extra room (currently arranged as a second living space) also has a triple BIR and could be utilised as a fourth bedroom or home office. There is shared access to the home's main bathroom which offers a bath, vanity, shower and separate WC. The nearby laundry room has handy external access to the clothesline, and there is additional storage space in the hallway.
Securely park your vehicle in the SLUG with internal and external access, and navigate town by foot or bike. The fully-enclosed north-facing yard is the ideal spot to host gatherings, let kids and pets play, or simply sit back and relax. Surrounded by simple garden beds, the space is low-maintenance and tidy, and is accessed by a picket-lined roller gate. With all of the town's assets at your doorstep, this attractive and private home will provide years of happy memories to come. Arrange an inspection today.
- Positioned just moments from beautiful Swan Bay and the Rail Trail
- Play, entertain or relax in the sunny, fully-enclosed north-facing yard
- 3 generous bedrooms (master with ens/WIR) with optional 4th/study
- Ducted heating and cooling ensures year-round comfort
- Neutral colour palette and timber venetian blinds throughout
- A short easy walk to the town's shops, beaches and amenities

Address: 59 Pearl Bay Passage St Leonards VIC 3223
Description:
Super Block Opportunity
With land becoming scarce in the 'old' Seachange Estate this 390m2 (approx.) allotment offers a rare opportunity to purchase titled land in this well renowned housing estate. The allotment is situated less than 900m to the cool blue waters of Port Phillip Bay and with the thriving township of St Leonards only five minutes drive away, your future beach-side lifestyle is ideally located.
Enjoy a walk along the picturesque foreshore or cool off with a dip at one of the local beaches - the opportunities for fun in the sun are endless.

Description:
Family Living That Feels Like A Holiday
The Feel:
Boasting bay views & close proximity to village shops, parks & schools, this tri-level family home is located in a prestigious locale. This property comprises 4 bedrooms, including a king-size master with private balcony & Bay views, WIR & en-suite. A second master with wet area offers versatility for guest accommodation or growing children, while upstairs presents 2 additional bedrooms, or a flexible home office. Ducted heating/cooling throughout & a gas log fire in the main living area provide year-round comfort, while the well-equipped kitchen & meals open to a covered deck & protected cottage garden. Space & style is yours on Panoramic Terrace.
The Facts:
-Custom 3-storey property with zoned floorplan for entertaining & family life
-Generous lounge room with stunning views & cosy gas log fire
-Covered north-facing balcony is the perfect place to watch great sunsets over the Bay
-Spacious, light-filled living areas to the front & rear, with outstanding design features
-High ceilings, tiled entry & New English Oak timber floors/stairs extend the sense of spaciousness
-Superb fixtures, double glazed windows & quality carpet flooring throughout
-Well-equipped kitchen with central island bench & ample storage
-Whirlpool dual electric ovens, 5 burner gas hob & Electrolux dishwasher
-Seamless connection to rear covered deck with café blinds for entertaining & relaxing
-Low maintenance cottage garden with flowering gum, lemon & olive trees
-Elevated Master captures panoramic views of Corio Bay, the You Yangs & surrounding countryside
-Second master with en-suite offers versatility for guest accommodation or growing children
-Upstairs presents 2 more bedrooms, or option to utilise one as a dedicated home office
-Family bathroom with spa bath, large shower & separate WC
-Ducted Inverter heating & cooling ensures total comfort
-RC DLUG with exposed aggregate concrete driveway & convenient internal access
-Impressive features incl: double glazing, 3kw solar, 2 tanks, workshop & ample phone/tv points
-Kiln-dried hardwood battens to north-facing balcony exterior wall
-Set within a short walk of family amenities, shopping & a choice of schools
-Peaceful, quiet neighbourhood with parkland close by
The Owner Loves.
Our family loves the open plan kitchen/dining & the main living area that brings everyone together, yet with plenty of space for everyone to enjoy quiet time & study. Our days begin with coffee on the balcony & conclude with a glass of wine overlooking the Bay & You Yangs.

Description:
Simply The Best!
Without a doubt this executive style residence announces itself as one of the finest in the local property market! The modern contemporary design is complemented by a wonderfully warm 'welcome home' feel. An inclusions list of the highest calibre creates a 'must see' for prospective purchases who demand uncompromising excellence. The complete article & a genuine 'turn key' prospect this could be the ultimate seachange lifestyle you have been searching for!
3 beautifully appointed bedrooms; the luxurious master suite is complete with an impressive ensuite & walk in robe. Bedrooms 2 & 3 are oversized and also offer walk in robes. A study provides further flexibility to what is already a very adaptable floor plan.
The primary living zone consists of an open plan kitchen/family/dining; dual glass sliding doors promote an abundance of natural light & creates a seamless connection to an expansive hardwood deck sure to be a highlight for those who love to entertain.
The kitchen is 'top shelf' in every sense; sleek contemporary straight lines work effortlessly with earthy textures and tones. Expansive dual stone bench tops, butler's pantry, custom cabinetry, feature pendant lighting, Veneto 900mm stainless steel gas cook top & Fisher & Paykel Double DishDrawer.
A 2nd independent living area showcases wonder scale; a feature floor to ceiling window takes full advantage of the northerly aspect & frames the beautiful landscaped garden setting the flowering natives often attract the local birdlife.
A home of this calibre boasts an impressive inclusions list; Bonaire Navigator 3 zoned gas ducted heating, dual split system heating/cooling, custom window furnishings, European appliances, landscaped gardens (with a low maintenance profile), exposed aggregate driveway, hardwood decking, oversized double remote controlled garage & an impressive 5.75kw solar power system ensures this property is winning the efficiency stakes. Many more fine features to be discovered on further inspection.
The A+ location simply cannot be overstated; set within a boutique pocket of Clifton Springs flanked by quality homes. A central orientation has you perfectly placed to take full advantage of Drysdale's fully equipped amenities (retail & health services). The tranquil setting of McLeods Waterholes Reserve is only a short stroll away with easy access to the Clifton Springs Boat Ramp & the rolling green fairways of the Clifton Springs Golf Club.

Description:
The Four Seasons!
Positioned within a tranquil green leafy setting this charming residence complete with all the modern comforts delivers a truly idyllic 'four seasons' lifestyle home.
-The spring bloom; a dazzling colour pallet of flowering natives and blossoms
-Balmy summer nights capturing cool summer breezes
-The ever changing landscape of a classic autumn
-Rolling green pastures of the neighbouring parklands over the winter months
Charming 3 bedroom residence boasts a warm and welcoming feel; flanked by the Bullimah Reserve on both the rear and side boundaries creates a peaceful haven.
The open plan living area boasts a wonderful northerly aspect and is light filled
A modernised galley style kitchen features stainless steel appliances, custom cabinetry and expansive benchtops
A glass sliding door from the primary living zone creates a seamless connection to a beautifully appointed enclosed alfresco lovely space to take in an early coffee or an evening glass of wine from one of the Bellarine's award wining wineries.
Courtesy of the prime landing of approximately 588m2 this property boasts lovely established gardens and an enviable openness.
A generous (7.8m x 3.7m approx) remote controlled roller door carport is complemented by an equally generous (6.2m x 3.7m approx) shed; providing room enough for the car, boat and even the jet ski.
All the modern comforts and lifestyle features one could wish for the ultimate 'sea change' property prospect.
The A+ location of this property cannot be understated; close proximity to the water's edge, neighbouring parklands, the Clifton Springs Golf Course only a short stroll away and the highly regarded Clifton Springs Boat Ramp is literally just down the road. The Bellarine Peninsula offers a wonderful 'seaside lifestyle; a vibrant cafe and restaurant scene, award winning wineries and so much more!

Description:
Lot 577 Meredith Avenue, Seachange Estate
The latest extension to the beautiful Seachange Estate at St.Leonards, Stage 11A to be released - 9am 24th September 2018.
With lots ranging from 300sqm to over 500sqm and with frontages from 12m to 16m (and everything in between) there really is something to suit everyone's lifestyle and budget.
The quality of the previous stages is available for all to see with the landscaping themes to be continued into the next stages. Of particular note will be the palm tree lined dual carriage way entry boulevard as well as over 5 acres of wetland reserve available for passive recreation.
Less than 90 minutes from Melbourne and 30 minutes from Geelong 'Seachange' represents outstanding value for money and is no doubt why it is selling so quickly.
- Over 500 Lots sold in only 14 months
- Walk to the beach
- 1 hectare reserve with multi-aged playground, pavilion, soccer goal & half basketball court.
Stage 11A is to be released at 9am on the 24th of September 2018 – register your interest NOW!
www.seachangeestate.com.au

Description:
Beautiful Bayside Entertainer!
The Feel:
Commanding attention within a covetable bayside estate, this two storey 4BR home is completely ready for you to enjoy the best of the Bellarine. Offering glimpses across the bay and You Yangs, surrounded by grassy open space, this family property offers ease of lifestyle with all the comforts and luxuries of a modern retreat.
The Facts:
-Private retreat and living space to the lower level
-Upstairs OP living, kitchen and dining with balcony access
-Stone benchtops, 900mm gas cooktop/oven and WIP
-Bay glimpses and calming outlooks across the You Yangs
-Undercover alfresco deck, flowing onto flat grassy yard
-3 BRs enjoy private placement, sharing the main bath
-Upstairs master suite with ensuite, WIR and private balcony
-Separate powder room for guest convenience upstairs
-Low maintenance brick/rendered facade, DLUG with int. entry
-Ideal placement for all water sports and nature lovers
-Enjoy close proximity to award winning restaurants and wineries
-Schools, public transport and practical facilities all close by
-A beautiful place to call home or bayside holiday retreat
The Owner Loves.
The ample outdoor space is perfect for entertaining all year round, with plenty of grass perfect for pets and families. The reverse living layout maximizes the stunning views of the bay all year round and the location is central to everything you need in a quiet well established street.

Description:
Panoramic views of the Bay
Overlooking Corio Bay, offering panoramic views of the lights of Geelong to the You Yangs is this beautifully presented family home on approx. 802 sqm.
Raised on concrete stumps with a lovely westerly facing verandah that wraps around to a private undercover entertaining deck. The easterly side is level with the ground & offers an easy access to the generous backyard.
Located in the much sought after Waterford Place this family home is amongst some of the most prestigious properties in Clifton Springs.
You'll love entertaining in the separate formal lounge with an outstanding outlook.
The large open plan kitchen, dining & casual living room is designed to take advantage of the views.
Warmed in winter by a feature gas log fire & cooled in summer by the split system air conditioner.
A king size bedroom big enough to easily fit a dressing chair.
The third bedroom will delight guests upon waking up with exceptional bay views to the lights of Geelong.
Offering wide side access for a caravan and/or boat without losing your view.
Double garage with drive through access for secure backyard storage.
Just wait til you see the sunset...
You are able to view this property 7 days a week by private inspection. We have created an environment to look and purchase safely. Please contact us to arrange a time to do so.

Description:
Brand new build in Curlewis with stunning upgrades!
This brand new build in Curlewis boasts chic style with stunning upgrades throughout the entire home. Fantastically located with Bayview Central shopping mall 100m from your doorstep offering a lifestyle of convenience. The open plan living, dining & kitchen keeps all the action in one place. Abundant natural light, high ceilings & sliding doors opening up to the outdoor alfresco creates a desirably spacious indoor-outdoor entertaining area or family hub. With contemporary features around every corner it's resort living combined with comfort & character!
Kitchen- 20mm caesarstone benchtops, double undermount sink, matte black tapware, pendant lights overhanging island bench, feature subway tile splashback, 900mm Westinghouse freestanding oven, retractable rangehood, pot drawers, dishwasher, overhead cabinetry, walk in pantry
Living- open plan living, dining & kitchen, timber laminate flooring, downlights, natural light, split system air conditioner, ducted heating, roller blinds, glass sliding doors open from main living to outdoor alfresco
Master bedroom- carpeted, roller blinds, ceiling fan, downlights, ducted heating, walk in robe, ensuite with single vanity, 20mm caesarstone benchtop, double semi frameless shower with subway feature tiling, dual shower heads & niche, matte black tapware, personal toilet
Additional two bedrooms- carpeted, ceiling fans, downlights, ducted heating, roller blinds, mirrored built in sliding robes
Main bathroom- single vanity, 20mm caesarstone benchtop, feature subway tile splashback, long bath, matte black tapware, single semi frameless shower, separate toilet
Outdoor- undercover cement alfresco with ceiling lights, low maintenance backyard, gravel pathway
Mod cons- laundry with extended bench & trough, double lock up garage with internal access, high ceilings (2340mm high) & Hampton's profiled doors throughout, square set cornices to entire living region & hallways, façade displays brick pillar lights, ceiling fans in all three bedrooms, ducted heating throughout home & split system air conditioner in main living/dining/kitchen for year round comfort
Ideal for: First Home Buyers, couples, downsizers, investors, retirees
Close by local facilities: Bayview Central Curlewis with Woolworths, BWS, Pharmacy & local cafes, Clifton Springs Primary School, Clifton Springs Tennis Club, local parks

Description:
Immaculate Three Bedroom Entertainer
This beautifully balanced 3-bedroom entertainer offers a seamless combination of indoor and outdoor spaces. Generously proportioned throughout, it features a large, well-appointed kitchen and bright open-plan living/dining, flowing seamlessly through sliding doors from beautiful interiors to a private entertainer's alfresco.
The property features:
Spacious open-plan living and dining
Kitchen showcasing stainless steel appliances, Caesar stone bench-tops, laminate finished joinery, 900mm oven, gas cook-top, built in microwave and dishwasher
Ceiling fans in all three bedrooms
Three expansive bedrooms, two with BIR's, main offers walk in robe and ensuite
Tiled family bathroom with separate toilet
Extended double garage which connects to fully enclosed alfresco with wood fire, creating the perfect space for entertaining
Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling
Block out and privacy blinds throughout
Front and rear garden watering systems
The Bellarine Peninsula is thriving with activity and the Port Phillip Ferry now running daily to Melbourne Docklands. Check out the Bellarine 'Taste Trail' with farm-gate producers, wineries and award-winning cafes and restaurants.
Prominently positioned in Sealion Court with North facing facade, get your family into this 3-bed entertainer today by calling Trevor McManus on 0448 810 074 to arrange a private inspection.

Description:
Blue chip Lonsdale Dream Home
In an elevated position on one of old Lonsdales most sought after streets, sits this classic 70s beach house with breathtaking panoramic views. Watch the ships pass through the Rip from the balcony, or wander to the shops for a coffee, this immaculately presented, light filled home offers the perfect location to create holiday memories for generations to come or to become your dream home.
Offered over two levels the views are on display through floor to ceiling glazing in the upstairs open plan living area. Natural light and sunshine pour in to create comfort and calm. The log fire invites cosy relaxed winters, while summers are for enjoying the gentle cross breezes and sunny outdoor living on the deck. The central kitchen makes for easy entertaining with plentiful storage and recently updated double wall oven and sleek hob.
Also upstairs there are three generous bedrooms. Both the master and a second bedroom enjoy the stunning coastal vista and include built in robes. A family sized bathroom with separate bath and shower complete the upstairs floor plan. Downstairs includes a fourth bedroom and a large separate shower room with laundry for easy cleanups after a day at the beach. There is ample storage both indoors and in the lock up garage which also offers great potential to create a large second living space in the future if desired.
The lush back lawn is the perfect place for family barbeques and fun. A perimeter of mature Magnolia trees provide a pretty vista and established fruit and ficus trees offer a sheltered and shady backdrop for outdoor entertaining. The irrigation system helps to keep it all looking great and offers low maintenance living.
All the spoils of the exclusive sea side town are within easy walking distance. For those looking to enter this tightly held location 31 Cheshunt St is a genuine passport to truly embrace coastal life.

Address: 45 Santa Monica Boulevard Point Lonsdale VIC 3225
Description:
Character and space in abundance!
Designed around a central entertainer's courtyard, this characterful, brick veneer home on a large block, presents an exciting opportunity for a family who values easy coastal living with an abundance of space. Features include a sizeable stand-alone home office, plenty of off-street parking and a lofty main lounge room with open fireplace and bar. Ideally positioned just a short walk to Lake Victoria, the property also enjoys easy access to beaches, playgrounds and the local primary school.
Enter into the main lounge with its soaring pitched ceiling, timber-lined feature walls, swanky bar area with slate flooring, and cosy, brick open fireplace. Glass sliding doors provide access to the courtyard which is partially undercover and serves as the perfect spot to host large gatherings. Enjoy a relaxed BBQ with family and friends while the kids play cricket on the lawn or inspect the fish pond.
The master bedroom comes with a triple BIR and ensuite with updated vanity, WC and shower, while the minor bedrooms each have BIRs and are serviced by the home's main bathroom featuring a corner spa bath and new separate WC. The kitchen overlooks the courtyard and is presented in its original form (plus dishwasher) and the adjacent, bright dining space seats 10 comfortably. Recline and watch TV in the inviting sitting room with its in-built sideboard and feature lighting. Interiors and exteriors have been freshly painted, and timber-lined ceilings create a sense of warmth throughout.
Composed of low-maintenance garden beds and lawn, and surrounded by tall fencing, the outdoor spaces feel generous yet private. A double carport and oversized garage/shedding provide parking for several vehicles and a spot to store tools or beach paraphernalia, and the separate office poses a distraction-free opportunity to work from home.
Extras include instantaneous hot water, steel deck roofing, and a Vulcan wall furnace to keep the home cosy year-round.
To further increase the size of this already spacious property, consider purchasing with the adjoining 948 sqm (approx.) block of land at 3 Hillcrest Drive (see separate listing for details).
- Stand-alone office provides work-from-home opportunity
- House wraps around central courtyard, ideal for entertaining
- Lounge with lofty ceilings, open fireplace and bar
- Double carport & oversized garage provide ample off-street parking
- Great location with easy access to all of the town's assets
- Exciting potential to also purchase adjacent block of land

Description:
Endless Possibilities
Located in a quiet family-friendly haven close to green spaces and parks, and just a short stroll to ocean and bay beaches, this solid 3-bedroom brick home comes with potential in abundance. The huge (951sqm), north-south oriented allotment presents an exciting opportunity for investors, renovators and builders with vision. With 24 metres (approx.) of street frontage and plenty of space, subdivision possibilities include side-by-side townhouses with dual street frontage, or choosing to battleaxe the block and keep the existing home as is.
Constructed in 1975, with many of the original features intact, the circular floor plan leads through a cosy lounge room with Rinnai heater, a light-filled dining space and a neat, updated kitchen with a Technika oven and rangehood. The bathroom offers a bath, shower, vanity and separate WC near the laundry, which comes with external access to an undercover patio. Sleeping quarters are well-sized and carpeted; two come with double built-in robes, and the master has 90-degree glazing. Outdoors, cottage-style garden beds represent scope for further development and landscaping, and vehicles can be securely parked in the double garage. A couple of garden sheds keep bikes and beach gear tucked away.
Just around the corner, the Emily Street Lake is home to an abundance of birdlife and is a delightful natural environment; Lake Victoria also provides a chance for outdoor adventures. Just a short walk to the school, village shops & golf course, this peaceful location is unaffected by summer tourism and is highly sought after. Land size 951sqm (approx.).

Description:
Live the Country and Coast Lifestyle
The Feel:
Set on 2.5 acres (approx) this stunning residence has an vast array of features from the luxe kitchen, formal living rooms and incredible gardens. This home will appeal to many. Situated to enjoy the best of beach and bush, Ocean Groves surf and amenities are minutes away, and the local primary school is just around the corner. Ideal for families seeking the enormous benefits of life on acreage, this extensive property provides so much.
The Facts:
-Contemporary 3BR plus study home on 2.5 (approx). picturesque acres
-Tree lined driveway leads to home, set back from the road, with 100% privacy
-Rural lifestyle opportunity in tightly held Rhinds Rd, Wallington
-Living zones maximise the sunny North & West aspects, with a private, protected entertaining area
-Large kitchen positioned in the heart of the home, under high ceilings w/ stone island benchtop
-Smeg oven, Electrolux induction cooktop, Asko dishwasher & large Walk in Pantry
-2nd living offers formal lounge & dining room with garden views, large hearth & open fire place
-Bedrooms have fully fitted BIRs & enjoy garden views
-Master bedroom with ensuite with large shower & toilet
-Separate bedroom wing with bathroom, separate toilet & spa bath
-Stunning european Oak parquetry flooring
-Seasonal comfort with open fireplace, SSAC as well as ceiling fans
-Mature Orchard (40 trees) producing a range of fruit incl Apple, Pear, Nectarine, Peach and Cherry etc
-Mature Citrus incl Lime & Lemon
-DLUG with solid concrete flooring & internal door access to large workshop, ensuite, kitchen and 2 more separate store rooms
-13,500L Rainwater tank for garden & drinking, plus town water supply
-Only 5mins to Gateway Plaza SC, less than 10mins to Ocean Grove shops, cafes & beach
The Owner Loves.
I love the family/kitchen room, with the garden views through every window, it is such a very peaceful and comfortable home to be inside
